channel.title: Avatar legends help?
channel.description: ok well if you dont know what it is avatar legends is an indie game for xbox 360. right now im a game and ive got alot of xp but i want to leave. does anyone know if i lose my xp when i leave?

item.title: Avatar legends help?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Locked upon request. If you wish for this to be re-opened, just send me a PM.

Read full topic

item.title: Avatar legends help?
item.dc:creator: @Vexx Vexx
item.description:
@Vexx wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:4, topic:399695”][quote author=vexx1345 link=topic=496819.msg3632614#msg3632614 date=1308350740]

Looking at the information, it doesn’t seem so at all. Just to be safe though, what does it say when you try to leave?

nothing its just that i dont want to lose my xp and this is a boosting map so i dont think it ever ends…
[/quote]
Well it seems that people don’t loose EXP when leaving the game.[/quote]
nvm just noticed “give up” on pause menu -.- mod lock please.

Read full topic

item.title: Avatar legends help?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:

Looking at the information, it doesn’t seem so at all. Just to be safe though, what does it say when you try to leave?
[/quote]
nothing its just that i dont want to lose my xp and this is a boosting map so i dont think it ever ends…[/quote]
Well it seems that people don’t loose EXP when leaving the game.
